title: NEW SUMMER FEST GAME REVEALS, EA STICKING WITH BF2042, & MORE
description:
Sponsored by Raycon. Go to https://buyraycon.com/gameranx for 15% off your order!

Summer Game Fest is in full swing with new game reveals, release date announcements, updates, and more. Featuring a special guest.

title: Witcher 3: 10 NEW Things Discovered By Fans
description:
The Witcher 3 is worth revisiting thanks to some small but interesting discoveries by players over the years.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1
